title: Room Number
alertText: Please select your room number, then press 'Ok' to proceed.
verificationBD: Please enter the birth date of anyone staying in this room.
verificationDD: Please enter your departure date to confirm your booking.
invalidRoom: The room number you entered is incorrect. Please review it and try again.
freeReservation: This reservation is completely free of charge.
paidReservation: Please note that this reservation may have a fee. You'll be informed of the exact price when selecting your preferred restaurant
remainingReservations: Remaining free reservations including this one:
